mantras.title: Krishna Maha Mantra
mantras.translation: Salutations to the Lord Vasudeva (Krishna), the divine son of Vasudeva.

mantras.title: Hare Krishna Maha Mantra
mantras.sanskrit: हरे कृष्णा हरे कृष्णा कृष्णा कृष्णा हरे हरे, हरे रामा हरे रामा रामा रामा हरे हरे
mantras.transliteration: Hare Krishna Hare Krishna, Krishna Krishna Hare Hare, Hare Rama Hare Rama, Rama Rama Hare Hare
mantras.translation: O divine energy of the Lord, O all-attractive Lord, O supreme enjoyer, please engage me in your service.

mantras.title: Krishna Gayatri Mantra
mantras.sanskrit: ॐ देवकीनन्दनाय विद्महे वासुदेवाय धीमहि तन्नो कृष्णः प्रचोदयात्
mantras.transliteration: Om Devakinandanaya Vidmahe Vasudevaya Dhimahi Tanno Krishna Prachodayat
mantras.translation: Let us meditate on the son of Devaki (Krishna), may that divine Krishna inspire us.

mantras.title: Krishna Sharanam Mantra
mantras.translation: O Lord Krishna, I take refuge in you.
